authors.name: D R Hammond-Weinberger
authors.note: Protocol based on Thisse et al., 1993

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b4crc","text":"Whole mount in situ hybridization protocol optimized for single gene detection using chromogenic substrates NBT/BCIP in zebrafish (Danio rerio). Options are included for bleaching and permeabilization. This protocol beings with tissue preparation and ends with glycerol mounting for imaging. Probe synthesis is not included. This protocol has been used for embryos/larvae from 24 - 72 hpf.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working
